definition: to leave/to depart/to separate/to distinguish/to classify/other/another/don't ...!/to pin/to stick (sth) in
"knife" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 18)/see also 立刀旁[li4 dao1 pang2]/see also 側刀旁|侧刀旁[ce4 dao1 pang2]
to part or leave each other/to distinguish/difference/in different ways/differently/separately or individually
difference/to distinguish/to discriminate/to make a distinction/CL:個|个[ge4]
to leave/to bid farewell to/to say good-bye to

sentences.english: You neednt worry, my little treasure.
Don't eat up at one and you can have it after a while.
sentences.chinese: 別一下子全吃了，留一點過會兒再喫。

sentences.english: Please tell the boy not barge about the room.
sentences.chinese: 請叫那男孩別在房間裏亂碰亂撞。

sentences.english: B： Don't worry. You will meet nice people that will help you.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心，你會遇到貴人相助。

sentences.english: Don’t worry about mother, I’ll cover for you this time.
sentences.chinese: 別擔心媽媽那邊，這一次我會爲你掩護的。

sentences.english: Don't make any noise while the baby is sleeping.
sentences.chinese: 孩子睡覺時別發出任何聲音。

sentences.english: Don't push me, or I will break your neck.
sentences.chinese: 別欺人太甚，否則我擰斷你的脖子。

sentences.english: You do not so serious to me, I'm afraid I will betray you.
sentences.chinese: 請你別對我那麼認真，只怕我會背叛你。
那就別再說什麼死亡了。

sentences.english: Don't blame me for the delay.
Don't push the face down, but use the body to drive the head forward.
sentences.chinese: 別推下來，但使用面對身體來驅動頭向前。

sentences.english: Don't cut your finger on the broken glass.
sentences.chinese: 別讓碎玻璃割傷你的手。

sentences.english: Althogh I tried to pursuade him to stop smoking, he still could not make his mind.
sentences.chinese: 雖然我盡力勸他別抽菸了，他還是下不了決心。

sentences.english: Don't give me any lip service. I want to see some action!
sentences.chinese: 別對我說好聽的，我要見你的行動。

sentences.english: Don't let them jerk you around.
sentences.chinese: 別讓他們對你指手劃腳的。

sentences.english: Tell that child to stop pouting.
sentences.chinese: 叫那孩子別撅着嘴撒嬌。

definition: still/still in progress/still more/yet/even more/in addition/fairly/passably (good)/as early as/even/also/else
should/ought to/probably/must be/to deserve/to owe/to be sb's turn to do sth/that/the above-mentioned
improbable/unlikely/will not (act, happen etc)/not able/not having learned to do sth/(coll.) (Tw) don't mention it/not at all
to speak/to say/to explain/to scold/to tell off/a theory (typically the last character in a compound, as in 日心說|日心说 heliocentric theory)
to cross/to go over/to pass (time)/to celebrate (a holiday)/to live/to get along/excessively/too-
at or in the very same.../suitable/adequate/fitting/proper/to replace/to regard as/to think/to pawn/(coll.) to fail (a student)
to be/to act as/manage/withstand/when/during/ought/should/match equally/equal/same/obstruct/just at (a time or place)/on the spot/right/just at
ten million/countless/many/one must by all means
can/to be possible/to be able to/will/to be likely to/to be sure to/to assemble/to meet/to gather/to see/union/group/association/CL:個|个[ge4]/a moment (Taiwan pr. for this sense is [hui3])
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with

point/dot/drop/speck/o'clock/point (in space or time)/to draw a dot/to check on a list/to choose/to order (food in a restaurant)/to touch briefly/to hint/to light/to ignite/to pour a liquid drop by drop/(old) one fifth of a two-hour watch 更[geng1]/dot stroke in Chinese characters/classifier for items
this/these/(commonly pr. [zhei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing)
